Beachcomber/Ramhorn/Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer/Serpentor/Anubis/The 
Oblitercons/Amobeous:



Ramhorn and Beachcomber saw the Predacons get into the Ark, heading after 
them.  They saw them go into the CR chamber room, and waited.  They could see 
flames.  Luckily the fire prevention systems when in, quickly putting the 
flames out with flame retardent foam.  They then saw the Predacons stand near 
the entrance to the bridge.

Beachcomber activated his com on a secure channel to the bridge's com system. 
 "This is Beachcomber," he whispered, "there are three Predacons outside of 
the bridge, be careful." he said, raising his laser rifle, he charged 
forward, firing three laser bolts off at Rampage's back.

Ramhorn fired 23 sonic shells off at Rampage's back.

---

Scattershot landed on his knees, bending over a few feet from DeathStorm's 
head. 
"My...my power!  It's slipping away!  NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!" he screamed, 
raising his fists into the air, slamming them on the ground, still screaming 
"No!".

---

Serpentor watched Scattershot, chuckling, firing a blast from his plasma 
launcher, sending Scattershot forward, slamming to the ground unconsciouss 
after catching the blast in the middle of his back.

---

Nemesis Enforcer swooped, a foot going forward, sending Serpentor slamming 
into a tree.

---

The Oblitercons slowly approached the Ark, Dark One looking to his men.
"Predacons just got into the Ark.  Scavenger, Breakdown, and Pyro, take them 
down.  Hiss and I, will take down the Newcomers.

They all nodded, the three named before heading for the hole in the hull of 
the Ark.

Hiss transformed into his laser gun mode, Dark One catching him.  Taking aim, 
he fired a single laser burst, blowing apart the plasma rifle in Anubis' 
hands, the Newcomer stumbling backwards.

===

Amobeous scans detected an increase in energy signatures.

"Alright...Bacterium, we're in a base.  I'm not sure if it's the same base or 
not.  Either way, we may be able to get in good with the other Maximals if we 
give them this information.  I've heard tales that the Maximals who stay to 
long on this planet become uncivilized war mongers.  If that's true, 
hopefully this information will help.  Doubtful, but maybe not.  When I say 
when, transform to robot mode.  Be sure to have weapons ready.  We want to be 
able to get out quick if we are trapped."
